pathAssistantSteps.info: Amended implies that the agreement has been amended and a new agreement record has been created with the updated Discounts or Terms and conditions
Cancelled implies that the agreement was voided during the authoring process
Expired implies that the agreement is no longer active and the discounts linked to the agreement are no longer available for the customer
In Authoring status implies that a user has submitted the agreement for approvals and is in process of negotiations with his customer
In Effect implies that the agreement is active and the customer discounts have been created within SAP
Signatures implies that a user has completed the negotiation process and is awaiting signatures from relevant parties
Renewed implies that the agreement has been renewed and a new agreement record has been created with the updated discounts or Terms and conditions
Request status implies that a user has created an agreement header and have imported Agreement line items to be sent for approvals
Terminated implies that the agreement has been terminated by the user and discounts linked to the agreement are no longer available for the customer
